text: trying to escape the floods but this
escape doesn't get very far the car is
stuck and the family inside starts a
panic there are people stuck inside and
they cannot use the side doors to escape
some bystanders risk their own safety to
try to help thankfully they are able to
climb out of the back the water is
deceptively deep and moments later the
car sinks out of sight in other parts of
the country there have been mudslides
some were lucky to escape but lost loved
ones this woman says my daughter and I
were nearly dragged away but I managed
to escape that is why I was unable to
help my other relatives so severe is the
situation in parts of Bolivia that the
government has declared a state of
emergency rain is expected here at this
time of year but this year it's been
particularly intense tens of thousands
are in desperate need and the government
says help is on its way but whilst the
heavy rain continues the fear is there
could yet be more loss of life alphabet'
el BBC news
